body: unknown_sheep yeah. This story tells: the top and the bottom are high school friends, when the bottom was broken up with his girl friend, the top tell him his love, but did not succeed as the bottom couldn‘t understand his mean at that time. So the top left his hometown after graduated, and 10 years later, he met the bottom again when he back to the town. The bottom became a great firefighter at these year and married with his ex-girlfriend. He had two children now, but because his wife was pregnant continuity, he had no sex for a long time. When he invited the top to his home and drink, the top find himself still have desire to his friend, so the two men have sex after drinking. (Omg my English is so poor but I hope this can help you guys, QAQ)
